title: 人工智能垃圾分类作为循环经济和城市可持续发展的数据驱动决策支持工具
content:
arXiv:2601.22418v1 公告类型：新 
摘要：高效的垃圾分类对于智慧城市的循环经济实践和资源回收至关重要。本文评估了传统机器学习（随机森林、SVM、AdaBoost）和深度学习技术，包括自定义 CNN、
original_title: AI-Enabled Waste Classification as a Data-Driven Decision Support Tool for Circular Economy and Urban Sustainability
original_content:
arXiv:2601.22418v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Efficient waste sorting is crucial for enabling circular-economy practices and resource recovery in smart cities. This paper evaluates both traditional machine-learning (Random Forest, SVM, AdaBoost) and deep-learning techniques including custom CNNs,

title: 用于具有组合动作的强化学习的潜在球形流策略
content:
arXiv:2601.22211v1 公告类型：新 
摘要：具有组合动作空间的强化学习（RL）仍然具有挑战性，因为可行的动作集呈指数级大，并且受到复杂的可行性约束的控制，使得直接策略参数化不切实际。现有方法
original_title: Latent Spherical Flow Policy for Reinforcement Learning with Combinatorial Actions
original_content:
arXiv:2601.22211v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Reinforcement learning (RL) with combinatorial action spaces remains challenging because feasible action sets are exponentially large and governed by complex feasibility constraints, making direct policy parameterization impractical. Existing approach

title: OpenAI 推出新的 macOS 应用程序用于代理编码
content: OpenAI 为 Codex 发布了一款新的 macOS 应用程序，集成了自去年 Codex 推出以来流行的许多代理编码实践。
original_title: OpenAI launches new macOS app for agentic coding
original_content: OpenAI has released a new macOS app for Codex, integrating many of the agentic coding practices that have become popular since Codex launched last year.

title: 联盟要求联邦 Grok 禁止未经同意的性内容
content: 在 xAI 聊天机器人生成数千张未经同意的性图像，引发国家安全和儿童安全担忧后，非营利组织敦促美国政府暂停 Grok 在联邦机构的任职资格。
original_title: Coalition demands federal Grok ban over nonconsensual sexual content
original_content: Nonprofits urge the U.S. government to suspend Grok in federal agencies after the xAI chatbot generated thousands of nonconsensual sexual images, raising national security and child safety concerns.

title: 印度尼西亚“有条件”取消 Grok 轮胎
content: 继马来西亚和菲律宾之后，印度尼西亚也解除了对 xAI 聊天机器人 Grok 的禁令。
original_content: Indonesia has followed Malaysia and the Philippines in lifting a ban on xAI’s chatbot Grok.

title: 介绍用于高级机器人控制的 NVIDIA Cosmos 策略
original_title: Introducing NVIDIA Cosmos Policy for Advanced Robot Control

title: 揭秘可合并性：预测模型合并成功的可解释属性
content:
arXiv:2601.22285v1 公告类型：新 
摘要：模型合并结合了来自单独微调模型的知识，但成功因素仍然知之甚少。虽然最近的工作将可合并性视为一种内在属性，但我们通过与架构无关的框架展示了它从根本上依赖于
original_title: Demystifying Mergeability: Interpretable Properties to Predict Model Merging Success
original_content:
arXiv:2601.22285v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Model merging combines knowledge from separately fine-tuned models, yet success factors remain poorly understood. While recent work treats mergeability as an intrinsic property, we show with an architecture-agnostic framework that it fundamentally dep

title: 人工智能代理迅速崛起 eBay 禁止非法自动化购物
content: 新政策要求“为我购买”人工智能工具和聊天机器人在访问平台之前必须获得许可。
original_title: eBay bans illicit automated shopping amid rapid rise of AI agents
original_content: New policy requires "buy for me" AI tools and chatbots to obtain permission before accessing the platform.
